title: Topic 001 Question 132
body: You have deployed an application on a single Compute Engine instance. The application writes logs to disk. Users start reporting errors with the application. You want to diagnose the problem. What should you do?
options: Navigate to Cloud Logging and view the application logs.
Connect to the instance's serial console and read the application logs.
Configure a Health Check on the instance and set a Low Healthy Threshold value.
Install and configure the Cloud Logging Agent and view the logs from Cloud Logging.
